issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.16.4.1870 for Mac, 4.10 nightly 9 for Android ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? Ancak adguard'ın son güncellemesini yaptıktan sonra bu sitede karşıma reklamlar çıkmaya başladı. comment.body:
For me, it still does not work with: ``@@||googletagmanager.com/gtm.js$domain=merrell.com``.

However this seems to fix it:
``@@||googletagmanager.com/gtm.js$domain=merrell.com``
``@@||cookielaw.org^$domain=merrell.com``

issue.title: Cleanup duplicate rules in ChineseFilter
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

/js/pfad.js has been made redundant by /js/pfad*.js
|srootshare.com/otmyjs/ has been made redundant by ||srootshare.com^

||mphj.com/Runtime/Js/ has been made redundant by ||mphj.com^*Runtime/Js/
||4080kan.com/js/head1.js has been made redundant by ||4080kan.com/js/head

||wnacg.*/data/game/*/wap.gif has been made redundant by ||wnacg.*/data/game/
||4275.com/css/91kf.gif has been made redundant by ||4275.com/css/91kf.
##body > div[style$=";background: #000;opacity:0.01;"] has been made redundant by ##body > div[style$=";background: #000;opacity:0.01;"]
||waipian*.com/statics/recommend/ has been made redundant by ||waipian*.com/statics/recommend/
##.app > div.app_tj has been made redundant by ##.app > .app_tj
##body > div.zdhf has been made redundant by ##body > .zdhf
##body > div.dbfh has been made redundant by ##body > .dbfh

### Proposed solution

Merge or remove rules if possible.

### Additional information

_No response_

pull_request.title: Do not allow external services per default on trinkgut.de
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?
Prevent loading of third party services by default

### Enter the issue address

Example: https://www.trinkgut.de/maerkte/

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

By default the external services maps, vimeo and youtube are loaded. the default should block there are consent layers above the content which can be used if needed.

This filters should be in the widget list, but not in the cookie notice list.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Current State, map is loaded on request.:</summary>

![Bildschirmfoto vom 2025-05-23 11-40-07](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1ddf3db3-2ff5-44d9-a9cc-285e98cc3d6f)

</details>

<details>

<summary>Prevent loading of maps should look so:</summary>
![Bildschirmfoto vom 2025-05-23 11-40-03](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/718743ff-e613-4959-9962-0fc853c9b071)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

> Открываю почту и выскакивает баннер. Проблема появилась недавно. Установила AdGuard в Яндекс браузер с настройками по умолчанию и он заблочил всё что было в почте, всю боковую рекламу, но вот такие всплывающие баннеры никуда не делись, не блочатся ничем и никак

Яндекс Браузер может вмешиваться в работу расширений. Если не поможет включение фильтра всплывающих окон - проверьте в полноценном Хроме (он не нарушает работу расширений).
